name: pair of lamellar bone arm guards
name_plural: pairs of lamellar bone arm guards
description: A pair of arm guards made from leather with many small bone plates sewn onto strategic spots. Durable, yet light and due to the design of the plating, replacing missing pieces is easy enough.

name: lamellar bone body armor
description: A full body armor made out of leather, with several bone pieces sewn onto it, laying over each other like the tiles of a roof. This design offers great protection while replacing broken out pieces should be easy enough.

name: pair of lamellar bone armor gauntlets
name_plural: pairs of lamellar bone armor gauntlets
description: Leather gauntlets with bone plate reinforcements on important positions, while leaving the joints movable. Sturdy, yet allows for easy repairs due to the layering of plating.

name: lamellar bone armor helmet
description: A helmet made from leather, reinforced with many small bone plates in key positions. Offers decent protection to the entire head, but is cumbersome to wear.

name: pair of lamellar bone armor boots
name_plural: pairs of lamellar bone armor boots
description: Leather boots armored with plating made from bone, layered like the tiles of a roof.  Light, yet strong.

name: pair of boneplated arm guards
description: Leather arm guards that have been heavily reinforced using the boneplating of some skeletal monstrosity. While offering excellent protection, the hard to work plates are surprising heavy and may end up hindering movement by a bit.

name: boneplated leather body armor
description: A full leather body armor that has been heavily reinforced using the boneplating of some skeletal monstrosity. Due to the added weight of the plating, moving in this suit is surprisingly difficult, but it should protect you extremely well.

name: pair of boneplated leather gauntlets
description: Leather gauntlets which have been heavily reinforced using the boneplating of some skeletal monstrosity. While you tried leaving the joints movable, the extra weight added to your hands is noticable nontheless.

name: boneplated leather armor helmet
description: A full helmet made from leather with added reinforcements all around using sturdy boneplating. The extra weight to your head makes moving your head and breathing a chore, but it should keep your head well protected.

name: pair of boneplated armor boots
description: Leather boots covered in many reinforced boneplating pieces, layered like the tiles of a roof. The weight makes lifting your feet quite difficult, but the proctection is undeniable.
